implementation.name: Remote Server
implementation.description: Distributes EJB interface implementations to remote clients using a conversational serialization-based protocol.
implementation.detail: Implements the EJBHome and EJBObject as proxies which are generated at run-time

Delegates calls made remotely on its EJBHome and EJBObject proxies to the org.openejb.server.EjbDaemon class, which in turn, delegates the call to the OpenEJB container system using the OpenEJB.invoke method as per the container-server contract.
